select
distinct
from company
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into company (id, company_name, province, city, detailed_add, login_name, password, postal_code, gateway_number, sensor_number, flag, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailedAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gatewayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update company
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailed_add = #{record.detailedAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postal_code = #{record.postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gateway_number = #{record.gatewayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sensor_number = #{record.sensorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update company set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{record.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailed_add = #{record.detailedAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{record.loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{record.postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gateway_number = #{record.gatewayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sensor_number = #{record.sensorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{record.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update company
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detailed_add = #{detailedAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gateway_number = #{gatewayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sensor_number = #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailed_add = #{detailedAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postal_code = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gateway_number = #{gatewayNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sensor_number = #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from company where login_name=#{loginName} and flag!="1"
select id,login_name loginName from company where login_name=#{loginName} and password=#{pwd} and flag!="1"

select c.id,c.company_name,c.gateway_number,c.province,c.city,c.sensor_number, c.login_name ,k.`name`,k.phone_no,c.flag from company c left join linkman k on c.id=k.company_id where 1=1
and c.company_name like "%"#{companyName}"%"
and c.province like "%"#{province}"%"
AND c.city like "%"#{city}"%"
AND c.login_name like "%"#{loginName}"%"
AND k.name like "%"#{name}"%"
AND k.phone_no like "%"#{phoneNo}"%"
AND c.flag!="1"
select c.company_name companyName from company c where login_name=#{loginName}
select id,company_name companyName from company where company_name like "%"#{userName}"%" and flag!="1"
